name: Square Planet
description:
**** Over 250,000 downloads!****

Roll & jump across the Square Planet to rescue your friends from the Evil Squares!

Play the fearless Round Ball on his action-packed journey in a Square World. Edge your way around challenging hazards to complete the colorful levels. Collect shiny Rings, use amazing power-ups and discover the marvelous hidden areas.

Can YOU become the Savior of the Ball People ? Find out now … for FREE !

*****

Featured as "New & Noteworthy" in iTunes in 23 countries! US, Canada, Australia, France, Germany, Japan, China, Brazil and more.

Amazing press reviews:

148apps.com: 4/5 "Don’t even take a moment to second guess the download. Just do it…now"

gamezebo.com : 4/5 "New gameplay features are regularly introduced, including rolling on the ceiling and turning off alarms"

Kotaku : " Square Planet is a charming little accelerometer-based platformer"

AppGamer.net : "The square based world is pretty neat, with lots of lovely little touches like square bats and some interesting level design"

=> From the makers of hit game Ski Champion, downloaded over half a million times

*****

A WHOLE NEW BALL GAME
* Tilt to roll, tap to jump
* Invert gravity, unravel secret paths, avoid the square lasers
* Perform double jumps, hack into alarms

YOU HAVE MATTERS TO SQUARE
* Round up all 6 prisoners in every level
* Have the edge on the nasty Squares

ADVENTURE WITH AN EDGE
* From bats to trees to dog poo, everything is square and edgy on the Square Planet
* Roll your way through 16 colorful levels jam-packed with funny details
* Grab sneak peeks of the Squares in their daily lives

Time to get the ball rolling, download Square Planet now !
